title: tiruvaLar
sahitya:
tiruvaLar.  rAgA: khamAs.  tALA: Adi
 


1:  tiruvaLar mayilaiyin iraivan ninnaDi paNi shiriyanai ariviliyai ALa vA
  hari bhramanum tiruvaDi muDitoDar varum aDiyavar eLiyai enai yALa vA
 caraNam 2    akhila carAcara pashupati Aghiya amala parApara sadAshiva
  bhagava abpAra niravadhi krpAkara parama kabpAli svayambhava
 caraNam 3    oru bhikSATana uruvodu teruvil ulAvarum candra kalAdhara
  paradEvatai dAkSAyaNi karpaka pacchaik-koDi padar jaTAdhara
 caraNam 4    azhagum uruvum ezhudariya turIyAdhIta jaTa timira divAkara
  mazhu thrishUlam puliyadaL bhUti mayangezhil vadana nishAkara
 caraNam 5    unai maavAdaruL unadaDiAroDum uravumarAdaruL kapAliyE
  enai yunadadbhuta caraNa malarp-pada nizhalinil vaittaruL kapAliyE
